game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the legendary artifact buried deep within the ancient temple.
game.description: Long ago, a powerful artifact was hidden within an ancient temple, known only to a few. Your quest is to locate this artifact and bring it safely back. The journey will be filled with challenges and dangers, but the rewards are unimaginable.

task.description: In order to gain access to the temple, you will need to find the ancient key that opens its massive doors. The key is said to be guarded by a ferocious beast deep within the forest.

task.objective: Enter the temple and find the artifact
task.description: Once you have obtained the ancient key, use it to gain access to the temple. Be careful as the temple is filled with traps and enemies. Once inside, search every room in your quest to find the legendary artifact.
